completions.nl_description: Recolor all neighbors of objects of color X to color R
Recolor the inner parts of shapes containing the color X, but keep the outer border intact.
Recolor all objects of color X to color R
Recolor the objects of size 2 inside the larger object of size greater than 10 to color R.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this other)) (filter (and (size_equals (size_of this) 2) (and (neighbor_of this other) (size_equals (size_of other) max)))) (apply (update_color R))))

completions.nl_description: Recolor the inner cells of the hollow X-shaped objects with red color.
Recolor all objects with color X to color R if any part of the object touches the grid border
Recolor the cells in the middle row of each object of size 5 or more to color R.
Change the color of all `O` cells that are neighbors of `X` clusters to `R`.
Recolor all 'O' cells that are neighbors of 'X' cells to 'R'.
Recolor 'R' those objects which are enclosed by 'X' in the adjacent cells.
Recolor the inner pixels of all X objects to R.
Recolor red the inner nodes of objects with color X
Recolor specific cells in the objects of color X to color R
Recolor the cells equal to X and at the same time are neighbors of an object of color R, to color R.
Recolor all objects of color O that are neighbors of objects of color X to color R
Recolor the middle cells of all enclosed objects to color R.
Recolor the interior of all hollow rectangles to color R.
Change the color to R for any pixel surrounded by pixels of color X.
Recolor all objects of color X with at least one neighboring cell colored X to color R.
Color the central pixels of the objects with more than 1 pixel to color R.
Color the inner regions of objects of color X with color R.
Inside the objects colored as X, change the inner squares to color R.
Recolor to R the objects that are enclosed inside an X, leaving the border of X unchanged.
Recolor the objects with size 2 that are adjacent to an object with color X to color R.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors to X objects to color R.
Color the internal 2x2 area of X objects to R
recolor all R's in the objects of color X's, when they are within the boundary of X's
Recolor all cells that are neighbors of objects of color X to color R.
Recolor the objects that are neighbors of other objects with color X with color R.
Recolor the bottom-right quarter of the 'X' shapes (not entirely enclosed objects) to 'R'.
Recolor the center of all enclosed X-shaped objects in the grid to color R.
Recolor the internal cells of objects of color X that are enclosed by other X objects to color R.
Color all the inside area of all 'X' rectangles with 'R'.
Recolor all the cells of color 'O' that are neighbors of cells of color 'X' to color 'R'.
Recolor the interior of squares in each grid to color R.
completions.code: (do (rule (vars (this)) (filter (shape_equals (shape_of this) enclosed)) (apply (fill_rectangle R false) ) ) )

completions.nl_description: Recolor all cells enclosed by objects of color X to R.
Recolor the interior of hollow rectangles to color R.
Recolor the immediate neighbors of the X objects to color R.
Recolor the cells such that any cell along the perimeter of an X block is colored R, if the cell is enclosed by X.
Recolor the neighboring cells of R contained within the objects of color X.
Recolor the cells inside objects of color X that are not part of the border to color R
Recolor objects adjacent to X in input grid to red at respective positions in output grid
Recolor the objects within the light blue 'X' shapes so that they change color accordingly.
Recolor the first column and row cells of objects of color X to color R
Recolor the inner squares of the object marked with X to color R
Recolor all objects of color O that are neighbors of objects of color X to color R.
Recolor the 2x2 internal pieces of color X to color R.
All the objects of color O that are neighbors of an object of color X are recolored to color R.
Recolor all isolated sections in the grid to color R.
Recolor the smaller inner parts of objects of color X with color R.
Recolor all objects of color X and the color of their neighbors to color R.
Recolor all the cells within the X objects of size greater than 1 to R.
Recolor all objects of color R to color X.
Recolor all objects of size 2 to color R.
Recolor the interior objects neighboring to the border of grey 'X' to color 'R'.
Change all cells that are neighbors of cells with color R to color R.
Recolor red the cells inside a plus-shaped structure.
Update the color of the immediate neighbors of objects of size 5 to R.
Move all objects adjacent to objects of color X one step towards them, then recolor them to color R.
Recolor the center part of the X-shaped objects to color R.
Recolor the inner objects surrounded by 'X' to color 'R'.
Recolor the neighbors of 'X' objects to 'R'
Recolor all connected groups of two or more X cells that are enclosed on all four sides with the color R.
Recolor cells in the middle of each X-shaped pattern to red.
Change the color of all enclosed regions of color X to color R.
Recolor all interior cells of the enclosed gray objects to color R.
Recolor all cells inside objects that are neighbors of at least one object of color X to color R.
Recolor the objects composed of 3 pixels forming an L shape to color R.
Recolor the cells within the cross-shaped regions from cell color X to R.
Recolor the objects that are neighbors of another object to color R.
Recolor some interior pixels of the diagonal cross shape to color R.
Fill all the hollow squares with color R
Recolor all elements within shapes of color X to color R.
Recolor the object to R that is inside or neighboring to the object of color X.
Recolor the inner cells of every hollow rectangle of color X to color R.
Recolor the cells containing 'X' to 'R' if their neighboring cell is not 'X'.
Recolor all objects that are part of the larger X object to color R.
Recolor all occurrences of color 'O' that are enclosed by color 'X' to color 'R'.
Recolor the neighbor cells of color R objects to be R in all grids.
Recolor each 'this' object with the color red if it contains the neighbor of another 'other' object that has color equal to X.
Fill all the objects of size 4 with color R, if they are neighbors of an object of color X.
Recolor all internal objects to color R.
Recolor all cells that are surrounded by cells of color X, with color R.
Recolor the objects that intersect with other objects to color R.
Recolor all objects by replacing certain cells with color R, specifically the ones that appear in the same column of the master object but are not adjacent.
Recolor the neighboring cells of objects of color X to color R
Recolor the bottom-right 2x2 sub-matrices of each 'X' object in the color R
Recolor all objects adjacent to object X of height equals 2 to color R
Recolor the objects of size 2 that are colored X to R.
Recolor the cells that are neighboring non-square shaped objects having a square shape to color R.
Recolor the objects neighboring an object of color X to red
Recolor the second and third columns of the objects of color X, one at the bottom of an object and one at the top of an object, to the color R.
Recolor all red objects that are adjacent to black objects.
Recolor the pixels in the middle of the connected objects to red.
Change the color of cells that are within a 2x2 square, if the top left cell in that square is of color X, to color R.
Recolor the neighboring cells of color X to R.
Recolor the cells immediately inside the periphery of the objects with color R when the periphery is surrounded by the color X.
Recolor the cells of the objects of color X to color R, if they are neighbors of another object of color X.
Recolor the cells inside the objects enclosed by color X to color R.
Recolor the interior cells of rectangles formed by objects of color X to color R.
